item.title: How Mysql Index Works [1]
item.description: 1. BST(Binary Search Tree) Consider how to solve LeetCode 704: Binary Search: Input: nums = [-1,0,3,5,9,12], target = 9 Output: 4 Explanation: 9 exists in nums and its index is 4 We use divide and conquer strategy and that reduces the time complexity of finding an element to $O(logn)$ compared with $O(n)$ of simple loop through the array from the very first element. Here is the code: class Solution { public: int search(vector<int>& nums, int target) { return helper(nums, 0, nums.
